Question: In 1976, RCA sent a mobile studio to Graceland that made possible two full-scale recording sessions at this person's home.
Hints: This person was by now performing in a jumpsuit, which would become a trademark of his live act.
Whitburn has this person also with 18 and thus tied for second; Billboard has him third with 17.
A total of 17 this person singles were reissued during the year; all made the British top five.
